#summary Describes project Embox's usage on platform Lego Mindstorms NXT Atmel AT91SAM7S256 ARM7TDMI

= Introduction =

Project Embox has been ported on platform [http://mindstorms.lego.com/en-us/Default.aspx lego-mindstorms]. We use this platform to show possibilities of Embox to manage realtime systems which include limited hardware resources.
